DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine influence two Eating Frequency prescription , meal ( energy intake occur three meal per day ) grazing ( energy intake occur every two three hour per day ) , consumption ad libitum meal consumed end day , overall daily energy intake , ratio energy intake energy expenditure . It hypothesize graze condition produce low consumption even ad libitum meal , low daily energy intake , low ratio energy intake energy expenditure meal condition .
DOC.detailed_description: 20 men woman healthy weight participate study . The complete study design 2 x 2 mixed factorial design , between-subject factor order within-subject factor eat condition ( meal grazing ) . Depending upon eat condition , participant provide morning meal afternoon meal ( meal ) two small meal three snack consume every 2-3 hour ( graze ) . The type food amount food provide participant identical condition ; difference condition time space day food consume . The primary dependent variable amount , gram energy , food consume ad libitum meal consume even completion meal condition , overall daily energy intake , ratio daily energy intake energy expenditure . It hypothesize graze condition produce low consumption even ad libitum meal , low daily energy intake , low ratio energy intake energy expenditure meal condition .
DOC.criteria: age 18 35 year body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 history overweight obesity unrestrained eater ( < 12 Three Factor Eating Questionnaire [ TFEQ ] ) regularly participate least 150 minute moderateintense physical activity per week previous 4 week currently take medication affect appetite food intake medical condition affect eat currently follow therapeutic diet currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication gain lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month diagnose type 1 2 diabetes bariatric surgery report dislike food use investigation ( score 1 2 5point Likert scale ) report allergy food use investigation currently smoke report binge eat graduate student Department Nutrition pregnant , lactating , < 6 month postpartum .
